# includePointsOfInterest

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the search results should include points of interest.

## Declaration

```swift
get includePointsOfInterest(): boolean;
set includePointsOfInterest(value: boolean);
```

## Discussion

If you set this value to `false` and include a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Search/pointOfInterestFilter], the filter takes precedence and MapKit JS ignores the `false` value. The default value is `true`.
